entries.pageOneDescription:
Vodka Cruiser Sugar Free has enhanced the alcoholic beverage by combining genuine triple distilled vodka, Vodka Cruiser famous great taste with a sugar free formulation. 

Available in 3 exciting flavours, Cruiser Sugar Free is the answer for those who look to balance great times with well being. With less than 100 calories per serving & natural flavours, Cruiser Sugar Free is giving women what they want.
